anathema: Refuse to speak to a keketar, eschew a challenge by turning down a promotion or an advancement
edict: Divine the future, transform the bodies of willing creatures, rebel against organized structures
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Narriseminek (The Crownless, the Maker of Kings)](/Deities.aspx?ID=544)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 316

Called the Crownless and the Maker of Kings, Narriseminek often appears as a [protean](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=457) with a scar around their pate, as if left by a burning crown. Their true form, though similar, is rarely seen: an iridescent and golden protean with a halo of burning eyes but empty eye sockets. The protean lord of ascendance, [keketars](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3146), and revelations rarely interacts with nonproteans, but to their protean worshippers, they offer exalted transformations and revelations that can change a being’s entire outlook. Worshippers of Narriseminek, both mortal and protean, spend their time divining the future and using magic to transform their bodies—a practice they also extend to any other willing creatures that ask. Their revelations take the form of patterns emerging in otherwise random events; Narriseminek’s followers reject astrology and other forms of divination based on predictable cycles.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Monitor Demigods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=12)

**Edicts** Divine the future, transform the bodies of willing creatures, rebel against organized structures

**Anathema** Refuse to speak to a keketar, eschew a challenge by turning down a promotion or an advancement

**Area of Concern**
Ascendance, keketars, revelations

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)

**Favored Weapon** [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=382)

**Domains** [Disorientation](/Domains.aspx?ID=105), [Freedom](/Domains.aspx?ID=77), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=89)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=1603)

- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1471)

- **5th**
[Synesthesia](/Spells.aspx?ID=2035)

</column>
name: Narriseminek (The Crownless, the Maker of Kings)
religious_symbol: Imentesh head wreathed in a circle of flame
